fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Use an item you draw at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: > You draw an item and use it on the same night.

fields.name: > The items you can draw are:
fields.value:
> - Shield (Infinite Uses): Grant your target Powerful defense for the night. You can target yourself with this.
> - Vest (Infinite Uses): Grant your target Basic defense until they are attacked and need this protection to survive. You can target yourself with this.
> - Sword (1-use): Deal a basic attack to a player. If this attacks a rock, the sword breaks and you will not attack the rock, but still lose the ability.
> - Statue of a Rock (2-uses): Use the abilities of any rock role, whether they are in the game or not. This ability cannot kill.
